detail_desc: Soft jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, imitation suede braided belt and fake fly and press-stud. Decorative fabric appliqués at the front, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a batik pattern. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck and frills down the front. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Fitted jumper in an airy, fine-knit ribbed cashmere blend with short sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Wide, straight-cut T-shirt in pima cotton with jersey ribbing around the neckline.
Wide, straight-cut T-shirt in pima cotton with jersey ribbing around the neckline.
Leggings in soft jersey made from a modal and silk blend. High waist with wide, covered elastication and extra-long legs with openings for the heels.
Cold shoulder dress in sturdy, glittery jersey with a flounce at the top, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Cold shoulder dress in sturdy, glittery jersey with a flounce at the top, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short shorts in a silk weave with wide, covered elastication at the waist, pockets in the side seams and wide legs with rounded hems.
Boots in imitation leather with an imitation suede shaft and an adjustable tab with a metal buckle at the top and over the foot. Fleece linings and insoles and patterned soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
Striped T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a text print. Press-stud on one shoulder (not in sizes 1-4Y).
Striped T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a text print. Press-stud on one shoulder (not in sizes 1-4Y).
Coat in soft pile with narrow notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, and side pockets. Lined.
Coat in soft pile with narrow notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, and side pockets. Lined.
Coat in soft pile with narrow notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, and side pockets. Lined.

Hi-tops in imitation leather with coloured lights on the soles that flash with each step taken. Elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top, mesh linings and insoles, and patterned soles.
Glittery, lined bikini top with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastening at the back.
Fully lined, waist-high, glittery bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather sections, a padded edge and a tongue with an appliqué on the front. Elasticated lacing and a grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with a deep V-neck and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Frill-trimmed seams and covered buttons at the front and wide smocking at the back of the hem.
Blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with a deep V-neck and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Frill-trimmed seams and covered buttons at the front and wide smocking at the back of the hem.
Jacket in an airy weave with wide 3/4-length sleeves and long fringes at the hem. No fasteners.
Fitted tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a V-neck and long sleeves.
Wide trousers in an airy rib knit with an elasticated waist.

Knee-length dress in heavily draping woven fabric with a collar, V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam and a detachable D-ring belt at the waist. Unlined.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a stand-up collar.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a stand-up collar.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a stand-up collar.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a stand-up collar.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with shoulder straps and a gathered seam at the top.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with shoulder straps and a gathered seam at the top.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with shoulder straps and a gathered seam at the top.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with shoulder straps and a gathered seam at the top.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Backpack in woven fabric that can easily double up as a tote bag. Two handles at the top and adjustable, padded shoulder straps that unclip at the bottom to be stored in the outer compartment at the back. Hook-and-eye fastening and a zip at the top, a padded laptop sleeve on the inside, a smaller outer compartment on one short side and a large outer compartment with a zip at the front. Lightly padded base. Size approx. 14x30x43 cm.
Super-wide trousers in a textured linen and viscose weave. High paper bag waist with wide elastication and a frill trim at the top, side pockets, a low crotch and straight legs.
Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in satin. Shirt with rounded notch lapels and buttons down the front. Bottoms with elastication and a small frill trim at the waist.
Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in satin. Shirt with rounded notch lapels and buttons down the front. Bottoms with elastication and a small frill trim at the waist.

Waist bag in imitation leather with a rubber-like finish. Two-way zip at the front with a removable zip pull and carabiner hook. One zipped outer compartment, two inner compartments and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener at the waist. Lined. Size approx. 5x17x30 cm.
Wide tunic in a cotton weave with an opening at the front, ties at the top and gathers at the shoulders. Tiers to the hem and long, wide balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Wide tunic in a cotton weave with an opening at the front, ties at the top and gathers at the shoulders. Tiers to the hem and long, wide balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Wide tunic in a cotton weave with an opening at the front, ties at the top and gathers at the shoulders. Tiers to the hem and long, wide balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.

Tunic in airy chiffon with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, long batwing sleeves with a drawstring at the cuffs, and a seam at the waist with a drawstring at the sides. Partly lined.

Tunic in airy chiffon with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, long batwing sleeves with a drawstring at the cuffs, and a seam at the waist with a drawstring at the sides. Partly lined.

Tunic in airy chiffon with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, long batwing sleeves with a drawstring at the cuffs, and a seam at the waist with a drawstring at the sides. Partly lined.
Long, fitted dress in heavily draping, ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend. Narrow-cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Long, fitted dress in heavily draping, ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend. Narrow-cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and slits in the sides. Unlined.

Henley top in soft cotton jersey with a button placket and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with a tab and button and a contrasting colour lining on the inside of the cuffs. Slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and long sleeves. Open chest pocket and a straight-cut hem.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and long sleeves. Open chest pocket and a straight-cut hem.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and long sleeves. Open chest pocket and a straight-cut hem.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and long sleeves. Open chest pocket and a straight-cut hem.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and long sleeves. Open chest pocket and a straight-cut hem.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and long puff sleeves. Picot trim around the neckline and cuffs.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and long puff sleeves. Picot trim around the neckline and cuffs.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and long puff sleeves. Picot trim around the neckline and cuffs.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and long puff sleeves. Picot trim around the neckline and cuffs.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and long puff sleeves. Picot trim around the neckline and cuffs.
Trousers in a soft rib knit. High waist with covered elastication and flared legs.
Long, fitted jumper in a soft, heavily draping rib-knit viscose blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Glittery, flared skirt in three layers of tulle with covered elastication at the waist and a soft cotton jersey lining.
Glittery, flared skirt in three layers of tulle with covered elastication at the waist and a soft cotton jersey lining.
Dress in soft sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and a lined, glittery tulle skirt.
Dress in soft sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and a lined, glittery tulle skirt.

Long blouse in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, yoke with gathers at the shoulders and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and ties. Covered buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and high slits in the sides and centre front.

Slim-fit joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Slim-fit joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Slim-fit joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned thermal fleece with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves and long legs.

Short dress in chiffon crêpe with inset lace trims, an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.

Short dress in chiffon crêpe with inset lace trims, an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.
Trainers with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles.
Trainers with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles.
Trainers with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles.

Fitted body in lace with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with scalloped edges. Seam at the hips with a lower section in jersey, and press-studs at the crotch. Partly lined.
